name: Reflections (GGJ2023)
description:
Self-reflective walk sim. Hope that you can forgive me since I only had around two hours this year to make something for Global Game Jam on my own, I heavily relied on borrowed content.

Environment Source: Flooded Ground
Music Source: Erik Satie - Gnossienne No.1
Monologue Source: ChatGPT
Text-to-Speech Source: murf.ai - Amelia
